ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] New to Online Gaming
ygData.msgSnippet: The green lights are packet loss and Ping in and Ping out. You can turn them off by F12 I think or F11. one of them. Usually if you lose the right number and
ygData.messageBody:
The green lights are packet loss and Ping in and Ping
out.

You can turn them off by F12 I think or F11. one of
them.

Usually if you lose the right number and the two
middle ones go up, you will be disconnected soon.

Hope this helps

Rob
